column1: Funeral services will be held 11:00 am on Tuesday from the Schumacher & Benner Funeral Home & Crematory
column3: Pottstown. Officiating will be Reverend Barry L. Moyer. Burial will be in Highland Memorial Park
column4: Pottstown. There will be a viewing from 10:00 am until 11:00 am on Tuesday at the funeral home.
